channel.title: field boss monster on tera-mysterium
channel.description: Recent content in field boss monster on tera-mysterium

item.title: Field Boss Monster (legacy)
item.description: Field Boss Monsters are large monsters in open world. Currently there are 3 Field Boss Monsters - Ortan, Hazard, and Cerrus - all three spawn on Arborea. In patch v86.01, Field Boss Monsters Maknakh and Murderwing Monarch was added. In patch v87.02, Maknakh and Murderwing Monarch was removed due to lag issues. In patch v96.01, Maknakh returned as part of Commander’s Residence (20-Person) raid instance. In patch v86.03, Field Boss Monster LB-1 was added.
